senses.synonym: 05148040-n (something of little value; \""his promise is not worth a damn\""; \""not worth one red cent\""; \""not worth shucks\"");06623729-n (obscene words for unacceptable behavior; \""I put up with a lot of bullshit from that jerk\""; \""what he said was mostly bull\"");09834593-n (insulting terms of address for people who are stupid or irritating or ridiculous);13576978-n (a coarse term for defecation; \""he took a shit\"");13795187-n (a small worthless amount; \""you don't know jack\"");14878732-n (obscene terms for feces);00073791-v (have a bowel movement; \""The dog had made in the flower beds\"");00843665-v (give away information about somebody; \""He told on his classmate who had cheated on the exam\""
